title: Halsey and Evan Peters appear to CONFIRM dating as they hold hands while leaving her Halloween party
text:
Halsey and Evan Peters appear to have confirmed rumours that they are an item.

Emerging on Friday night, the 11 Minutes songstress, 25, and American Horror Story actor, 32, held hands while both donning terrifying Halloween costumes following her Almost Famous party in Los Angeles.

Sporting an edgy red wig, the singer wore full white facepaint and sexy thigh-high boots while Evan wore a similar style mask.

Who? Us? Halsey and Evan Peters appear to have confirmed rumours that they are an item as they stepped out for Halloween on Friday night

Halsey looked sensational for her night on the town as she dazzled in the ensemble while living it up with her handsome companion.

The duo were seen at lunch together at Sweet Butter in Sherman Oaks, California this week, cuddling closely up to one another.

The pair had already been spotted with one another a few weeks ago on a roller coaster at Six Flags, causing whisperings of a romance, but this latest appearance has only seemed to suggest the rumours are true.

The pair were seen with their arms around each other, with Halsey - real name Ashley Nicolette Frangipane - later touching Evan's face affectionately. The singer was in town for the CBS Radio We Can Survive concert at the Hollywood Bowl.

Out and about: The 11 Minutes songstress, 25, and American Horror Story actor, 32, held hands while both donning terrifying Halloween costumes following her Almost Famous party

Out and about: Donning an edgy red wig, the singer wore full white facepaint and sexy thigh-high boots while Evan wore a similar style mask

Spooky! The red wig stood out boldly against her white facepaint

A source told E!: 'Halsey has always been a huge fan of Evan's. A friend connected them and they had also been chatting over social media before hanging out.

'It's still very new, but they are both interested in dating each other and hanging out.'

When they were seen at Six Flags, a bystander said: 'They were laughing and flirting the whole time while we waited for the ride, it looked really romantic. It looked like they were having a fun date night.

All white? Her edgy boots added a new dimension into the ensemble

A source told E! News: 'Halsey has always been a huge fan of Evan's. A friend connected them and they had also been chatting over social media before deciding to hang out. 'It's still very new, but they are both interested in dating each other and hanging out'

'They were smiling and laughing together and looking into each other’s eyes as they were waiting for the ride to start...

'When we got off the rollercoaster, we bought the photo of them on the ride and saw that they were holding hands, their fingers were intertwined.'

Halsey hit Twitter to proclaim her affection for Evan in the past, before she is thought to have met him.

In 2012, she tweeted, 'Seriously Evan Peters stop making me attracted to alleged sociopaths and accused murderers…' referring to his characters on AHS.

Over: Evan and fellow AHS star fiancée Emma Roberts, 28, called time on their betrothal earlier this year
